name: G2-1 Emergency Medical Support
intro: The learning document for this test is at G2-1 Emergency Medical Support in the FENZ Portal (requires to login with your FENZ account)

structure.description: If a member of Fire and Emergency NZ is injured/unwell when on duty, under the terms of this policy who must be notified by the OIC?
options: No one, it is up to the injured person to notify the correct people

structure.description: If an on duty member of Fire and Emergency NZ is taken to hospital, what must the OIC ensure takes place?
options: That the injured person remains at work until they are replaced by another person
That they are provided with travel home, including their vehicle
That they are accompanied by a member of Fire and Emergency NZ until handover occurs to the emergency contact or they are discharged and returned home.
Nothing, the injured crew member needs to get themselves to hospital
correctAnswer: That they are provided with travel home, including their vehicle
That they are accompanied by a member of Fire and Emergency NZ until handover occurs to the emergency contact or they are discharged and returned home.

structure.description: At an incident when decontamination is carried out (other than gloves & boots) on people who have no PPE, level 1 or level 2 PPE or compromised level 3 or 4 PPE, what must the OIC ensure is requested?
options: ComCen are advised to request an ambulance
The on-call VSO is to bring replacement clothing, food, and transport the decontaminated people home
A tent so that people can get changed in privacy
structure.correctAnswer: ComCen are advised to request an ambulance

structure.description: What must the OIC ensure happens at an incident if there is an injury to a firefighter or a member of the public or, the incident is lower that 4th alarm but the OIC considers there is a significant risk of injury?
options: Ask the VSO to bring out a first aid kit and a blanket.
OIC must ensure that Comcen requests ambulance response
Request a Health and Safety Officer to attend
structure.correctAnswer: OIC must ensure that Comcen requests ambulance response
